name: Crix
description:
Crix is a mix of exploration, resource management and real-time strategy. Fight your way through four levels, each equipped with a unique boss and various other obstacles that may force you to alter your playstyle and strategies.

Normal difficulty can be challenging at first and Hard difficulty is actually hard, but remember that losing can be fun! Learn from your previous playthroughs and form an unbeatable strategy for the next run!
